text: Joseph McGhie (22 March 1884 – 8 September 1976) was a Scottish professional footballer who played as a centre-half for Football League clubs Sunderland and Sheffield United in the and for Brighton & Hove Albion of the Southern League. He was a member of the Albion team that won the 1910 FA Charity Shield. ==References== Category:1884 births Category:1976 deaths Category:People from Kilbirnie Category:Scottish footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Sunderland A.F.C. players Category:Sheffield United F.C. players Category:Brighton & Hove Albion F.C. players Category:Stalybridge Celtic F.C. players Category:English Football League players Category:Southern Football League players
title: Joe McGhie (footballer, born 1884)
